cyclethrough: ^You go home. Tomorrow is another day.

s2: ^Lune has paused in her playing and is looking at the sky.
s3: ^Lune sits out of the sun, flipping through a book.

Performing: ^The light notes of a flute drift on the wind.

c-0: ^"Lune, do you know The Airs of Mount Moira?"
^ "Maybe if I hum it you could pick up on it?"
^Lune looks interested. "I can give it a try, sure."

s2: ^Tash has his hands in his pockets, trying to look cool.

s1: ^Tash watches Lune while leaning against the wall.

too_tired: ^You're too tired today to do anything else.

b: ^[ERROR] - you need to initialise the sceneStart variable before using "seen_this_scene"!

map_plaza: ^[info font=merriweather side=accent]  This is the plaza. It's edged by interesting shops.  [/info]
map_east: ^You stroll to the eastern side of the plaza, where you can find Store1, Store2 and Store3.
map_west: ^You stroll to the western side of the plaza, where you can find Store4, Store5 and Store6.
